page.title: 19 Home Life by the Children
page.content: Louise Bardell,aged 9 years . I went for my first tennis lesson at Boxford,it was really good and I enjoyed it.On Monday I went for a walk with my dad and Anton.We saw the bluebells.After dinner we all went for a walk to Homey Bridge,but Anton and I went on our bikes.After tea we watched television,then went to bed. James Sandford,aged 9 years. On Saturday in the morning Daddy and I went into Hadleigh to my friend's house to give him his birthday present,a Jungle Book tape.He had a Sony Walkman from his parents.We had a game of darts and a game of cricket.After lunch we had a bike ride to the ford,Boxford and Stone Street and did something for the bike test.Mummy bought me a smart new track suit.Then I went to a swimming gala against Britannia.
